<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>[Deprecated] Get the currently defined model as svg uml image.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/model/uml"}></MethodEndpoint>

<SecuritySchemes infoPath={"docs/reference/api/resoto-core-rest-api"}></SecuritySchemes>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Use /graph/{graph_id}/model/uml instead.

## Request
